uvi.description:
netfilter: conntrack: serialize hash resizes and cleanups

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.10 by commit 7ea6f5848281182ce0cff6cafdcf3fbdeb8ca7e1. For more details please see the references link.
